reviewText: This is utterly ridiculous hack journalism, and fails miserably in attempting to portray AA as a cult. There are more than 200 different types of 12 step programs based on AA. That says more for what AA truly is, than does tabloid reporting.

Heaven forbid that a program should stop people from killing themselves with drugs and alcohol.  The people interviewed in this video have an extremely one-sided viewpoint, and they must work the the alcohol industry.  Don't waste your money.  (The only reason I rated this with one star is because the system wouldn't post "O" stars).
